name: Verify From,Till and Reason fields are mandatory fields for Leave Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Verify From,Till and Reason fields are mandatory fields for Leave Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, defaultTab=Leave, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
Then Verify "leave Contact Number,leave Alt Contact Number" fields are auto populated
Then Click on Submit button for Leave Tab
Then Verify "Leave From,Leave Till" calendar is mandatory field
Then Verify "leave Reason" text box is mandatory field

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Verify From,Till and Reason fields are mandatory fields for Leave Tab

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<heading>" of "<childTab>" tab
And Verify "<defaultTab>" displays by default
Then Verify "leave Contact Number,leave Alt Contact Number" fields are auto populated
Then Click on Submit button for Leave Tab
Then Verify "Leave From,Leave Till" calendar is mandatory field
Then Verify "leave Reason" text box is mandatory field
